Description: Rectangular fragment of cartonnage from a mummy case, painted in black, white, blue, red and yellow. Surviving decoration shows (left to right): part of the figure of a deity, probably either Osiris or Re-Horakhty; mummiform figure of one of the Sons of Horus, head lost; mummiform figure of one of the Sons of Horus, jackal-headed; part of the hieroglyphic sign for 'West'.
